text: annaqM pra ya#cCatyannAqda Eqva Ba#vati SyAqmO Ba#vatyEqtadvA anna#sya rUqpa(gm) samRu#ddhyai mAruqtaM pRuSniqmA la#BEqtA&nna#-kAqmO&nnaqM ~Mvai maqrutO#maqruta# Eqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq ta EqvAsmAq annaqM praya#cCantyannAqdaEqva Ba#vatiq pRuSni# rBavatyEqtadvA anna#sya rUqpa(gm) samRu#ddhyA aiqndrama#ruqNamA la#BEtEndriqyakA#maq indra#mEqva - [  ]  37
